    • Method Detail

      • createEnquiry

        public static void createEnquiry​(User user,
                                 BTOProject project)
        Creates a new enquiry submitted by an applicant.
        Parameters:
        user - The applicant submitting the enquiry.
        project - The BTOProject related to the enquiry.

      • editEnquiry

        public static void editEnquiry​(User user,
                               Enquiry enquiry)
        Edit an existing enquiry submitted by an applicant.
        Parameters:
        user - The applicant editing the enquiry.
        enquiry - The enquiry to be edited.

      • replyToEnquiry

        public static void replyToEnquiry​(User user,
                                  Enquiry enquiry)
        Allows an officer/manager managing thes project to reply to an enquiry.
        Parameters:
        user - The user replying to the enquiry.
        enquiry - The enquiry to be replied to.

      • getEnquiriesByUser

        public static List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByUser​(User user)
        Get enquiries that belong to a specific user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user whose enquiries are to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        List of enquiries belonging to the user. Returns null if the user is an HDB Manager.

      • getEnquiriesByOfficerOrManager

        public static List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByOfficerOrManager​(User user)
        Get enquiries from projects that a officer is managing. Sorted by project application opening date, latest first. Then, enquiry date, latest first.
        Parameters:
        user - The HDB officer/HDB Manager whose enquiries are to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        List of enquiries belonging to the HDB Officer / HDB Manager's managed projects.

      • getAllEnquiries

        public static List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
        Get all enquiries in the system.
        Returns:
        List of all enquiries in the system.
